text: YOU: Hi Mimi, can you tell me something cool that Timur has done in the past few months? MIMI: Lately, Timur has been really interested in native iOS development, so he's been working on a few apps in his spare time. He built a RESTful API with Python on Google App Engine that will feed both a web app and an iOS app. YOU: That's so cool! Thanks Mimi. MIMI: My pleasure! Take care!
notMyTurn: MIMI: I think Alice wanted to talk to you...
